system.description: At 14th level, you can call upon nature to help you in your hour of need, and it will answer. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.xe7t43c42bkhxihe]{Conjure Animals}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.rkmcwdyfuhbjyimk]{Conjure Fey}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.f70ggbrjfojmf2hk]{Conjure Woodland Beings} spells (They do not count against your bard spells known.) You may affect twice as many of these creatures as normal with a use of your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.3qc1rqk8rwvl8van]{Battle Hymn}.
